title: JerZei
author: JerZei
created_time: July 04, 2022, 05:05:11 PMLast edit: July 04, 2022, 05:16:59 PM by JerZei
content: – WEBSITE – TWITTER – TG GROUP-- TG CHANNEL – DISCORD – REDDIT-- TG CHANNEL – MEDIUM –BOUNTY DETAILS & RULES1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by JerZei Bounty Management. 2. 30,000 PALA (~$20,000)  are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.—--------------------------------1. All participants must join Party Land official Telegram Group and Telegram Channel.2. All participants must join JerZei  Telegram Group and Telegram Channel.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the JerZei's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently.7. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.8. Participants’ forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in Article and Video campaigns.9. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is LIBEL or UNJUSTIFIABLE.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.10. WE ARE NOT IN-CHARGE OF REWARD DISTRIBUTION. IT’S NOT AN ESCROW BOUNTY.11. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Authentication Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Joined Campaigns:ERC-20 Wallet Address:BOUNTY ALLOCATION & SCHEDULETwitter            20%Telegram        10%Facebook       20Instagram       20Article             15%Video              15%Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 500 approved participants.Telegram: First 300 approved participants.Facebook: First 400 approved participants.Instagram: First 400 approved participants.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (05.07 - 11.07)Week 2 (12.07 - 18.07)Week 3 (19.07 - 25.07)Week 4 (26.07 - 01.08)Rewards: [/b] 1. Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Party Land Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 300 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Participants must use #PALA #PartyLand #CryptoCurrency hashtags in every retweet or tweet.5. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.2. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/qs2mshaWQgT4UpUA9Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must join Party Land Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.2. Participants have to write 5 constructive messages per week (maximum 1 post/day).5. Meaningless, irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either you can ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.3. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.4. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group5. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/A4cXavJh66dtfNr9ARewards:  1. Have more than 300 Friends: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 Friends: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 Friends: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 Friends: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Party Land Facebook Page.2. Instagram accounts must have a minimum of 300 followers.3. Participants have to make new post or share 5 posts per week (maximum 1 share/day).4. Participants must use #PALA #PartyLand #CryptoCurrency hashtags in every retweet or tweet.5. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.2. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/4Xo3Wj6nX7qrPZrt5Rewards:  1. Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Party Land Instagram Page.2. Instagram accounts must have a minimum of 300 followers.3. Participants have to make new post or share 5 posts per week (maximum 1 share/day).4. Participants must use #PALA #PartyLand #CryptoCurrency hashtags in every retweet or tweet.5. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.2. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/7X4CxfjYtHY9ZRKD8Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Each participant can write 1 article only.2. Every participant must follow Party Land Medium Page and Reddit. 3. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 300 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.4. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.5. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.6. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.7. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn.8. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, daily Lottery, presale, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.9. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.10. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.11. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!12. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.5. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.2. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/Wm3MT1x7z2x725wH9Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >3000 views)Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >1500 views )Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >500 views)Rules:  1. Each participant can send 1 video only.2. Every participant must follow Party LandMedium Page and Reddit.3. Participants must have at least 300+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.4. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.6. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded.There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices.7. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified11. Join Party Land official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel.12. Join JerZei’s Telegram Group13. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/JLNBszukeUaWaM8x6
